title: Identify a chip that's very hot on PCB
content:
Does anyone recognize this chip by chance?
On the chip it is written:
DEYA
SB86
See picture:

I can't find anything on the web...
Any help will be appreciated!

comments.text: Iâ€™m voting to close this question because not related to reverse-engineering

answers_data.content:
Logo : Intersil
DEYA could be ISL9000AIRNNZ see datasheet page 3 of
http://res.ameya360.com/3C/DC/BF/ADE72A0B7B90509FB777F89C72_A.pdf
